
	The gmakew32.exe supplied with this product is a slightly modified
	version of GNU Make for Win32 and is covered by the GNU General
	Public License.  For information concerning the GPL or GNU Make
	go to www.gnu.org.  If you wish to receive a copy of the modified
	source code for this executable, Datalight will supply it upon
	request or you can visit www.gnu.org and download the unmodified
	source code.
